PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09842020-12-04JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActGarnishment, Attachment and Pension Diversion Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Garnishment and Attachment Regulations and the Pension Diversion Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the GARNISHMENT AND ATTACHMENT REGULATIONS AND THE PENSION DIVERSION REGULATIONS in order to (1) reflect new defined terms; (2) provide greater flexibility for service of documents and responses by allowing for the submission of documents and responses by electronic means where an agreement is in place; (3) include a pro-vision specifying that salary garnishment ceases to be binding six months after the last salary payable to a former employee is paid; (4) allow a provincial enforcement service to apply for pension diversion with a copy of a support order that is not court certified and a statement of arrears; and (5) update the addresses where documents are to be submitted.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0265 Publication Date: 2020-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
